rdf:Property.rdfs:label: overlaps in time with
перекрывает во времени
προηγείται μερικώς επικαλύπτοντας
überlappt zeitlich mit
est partiellement recouverte dans le temps par
sobrepõe temporalmente
时段重叠了
rdf:Property.rdfs:comment: This property identifies an overlap between the instances of E52 Time-Span of two instances of E2 Temporal Entity. It implies a temporal order between the two entities: if A overlaps in time B, then A must start before B, and B must end after A. This property is only necessary if the relevant time spans are unknown (otherwise the relationship can be calculated). This property is the same as the "overlaps / overlapped-by" relationships of Allen’s temporal logic (Allen, 1983, pp. 832-843).
